Marco Baroni wrote:

>
> (Right now, I seem to have out of memory problems, having tried a broad
> scope crawl... still a lot to learn! ;-) )
>
Broad-scoped crawls will run out of memory.  See known limitations for 
1.0.0 version for an explanatory note: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_0_0_limitations.  
Running out of mem. should be fixed by the next release.
St.Ack
